   19: %%
   20: -module(code_coverage_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   23: -export([toggle_modes/1,
   24:          get_coverage/1,
   25:          error_info/1]).
   26: 
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   31:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   32: 
   33: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   34:     case code:coverage_support() of
   35:         true ->
   36:             Config;
   37:         false ->
   38:             {skip, "This runtime system does not support coverage"}
   39:     end.
   40: 
   41: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: all() ->
   45:     [toggle_modes,get_coverage,error_info].
   46: 
   47: toggle_modes(_Config) ->
   48:     none = code:get_coverage_mode(?MODULE),
   49:     OldMode = code:get_coverage_mode(),
   50:     try
   51:         do_toggle_modes(OldMode)
   52:     after
   53:         code:set_coverage_mode(OldMode)
   54:     end.
   55: 
   56: do_toggle_modes(CurrentMode) ->
   57:     Modes = [none,line,line_counters,function,function_counters],
   58:     Last = lists:last(Modes),
   59:     Last = do_toggle_modes_1(CurrentMode, Modes),
   60:     ok.
   61: 
   62: do_toggle_modes_1(Current, [Mode|Modes]) ->
   63:     Current = code:set_coverage_mode(Mode),
   64:     none = code:get_coverage_mode(?MODULE),
   65:     do_toggle_modes_1(Mode, Modes);
   66: do_toggle_modes_1(Current, []) ->
   67:     Current.
   68: 
   69: get_coverage(Config) ->
   70:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   71:     OldMode = code:get_coverage_mode(),
   72: 
   73:     try
   74:         do_get_coverage(PrivDir)
   75:     after
   76:         code:set_coverage_mode(OldMode)
   77:     end.
   78: 
   79: do_get_coverage(PrivDir) ->
   80:     M = get_coverage_test,
   81:     S = ~"""
   82:         -module(get_coverage_test).
   83:         -export([fact/1,fib/1]).
   84: 
   85:         fact(N) when is_integer(N), N >= 0 ->   %4
   86:             fact(N, 1).                         %5
   87: 
   88:         fact(0, P) ->
   89:             P;                                  %8
   90:         fact(N, P) ->
   91:             fact(N - 1, P * N).                 %10
   92: 
   93:         fib(N) ->
   94:             fib(N, 0, 1).                       %13
   95: 
   96:         fib(0, _, B) ->
   97:             B;                                  %16
   98:         fib(N, A, B) ->
   99:             fib(N - 1, B, A + B).               %18
  100:         """,
  101: 
  102:     ErlFile = filename:join(PrivDir, atom_to_list(M) ++ ".erl"),
  103:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, S),
  104:     {ok,M,Beam} = compile:file(ErlFile, [report,binary,line_coverage]),
  105: 
  106:     Run1 = fun() -> ok end,
  107:     Result1 = {[{{fact,1},0}, {{fact,2},0}, {{fib,1},0}, {{fib,3},0}],
  108:                [{5,0},{8,0},{10,0},{13,0},{16,0},{18,0}]},
  109:     do_get_coverage(M, Beam, Run1, Result1),
  110: 
  111:     Run2 = fun() -> M:fib(5) end,
  112:     Result2 = {[{{fact,1},0}, {{fact,2},0}, {{fib,1},1}, {{fib,3},6}],
  113:                [{5,0},{8,0},{10,0},{13,1},{16,1},{18,5}]},
  114:     do_get_coverage(M, Beam, Run2, Result2),
  115: 
  116:     %% Compile without line_coverage.
  117:     {ok,M,BeamFun} = compile:file(ErlFile, [report,binary]),
  118:     do_get_function_coverage(M, BeamFun, Run1, Result1),
  119:     do_ensure_no_line_coverage(M, BeamFun),
  120: 
  121:     none = code:get_coverage_mode(?MODULE),
  122: 
  123:     ok.
  124: 
  125: do_get_coverage(M, Beam, RunFun, Result) ->
  126:     {FunctionResult,LineCoverage} = Result,
  127:     FunctionResultBool = [{F,N =/= 0} || {F,N} <- FunctionResult],
  128: 
  129:     %% Test function coverage.
  130: 
  131:     do_get_function_coverage(M, Beam, RunFun, Result),
  132: 
  133:     %% Test line.
  134: 
  135:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(line),
  136:     {module,M} = code:load_binary(M, "", Beam),
  137:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(none),
  138:     RunFun(),
  139: 
  140:     line = code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  141: 
  142:     LineCoverageBool = [{F,N =/= 0} || {F,N} <- LineCoverage],
  143:     FunctionResultBool = code:get_coverage(function, M),
  144:     LineCoverageBool = code:get_coverage(line, M),
  145: 
  146:     LineCoverageBoolReset = [{F,false} || {F,_} <- LineCoverage],
  147:     code:reset_coverage(M),
  148:     LineCoverageBoolReset = code:get_coverage(line, M),
  149: 
  150:     unload(M),
  151: 
  152:     %% Test line_counters.
  153: 
  154:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(line_counters),
  155:     {module,M} = code:load_binary(M, "", Beam),
  156:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(none),
  157:     RunFun(),
  158: 
  159:     line_counters = code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  160: 
  161:     FunctionResultBool = code:get_coverage(function, M),
  162:     LineCoverage = code:get_coverage(line, M),
  163: 
  164:     LineCoverageZero = [{F,0} || {F,_} <- LineCoverage],
  165:     code:reset_coverage(M),
  166:     LineCoverageZero = code:get_coverage(line, M),
  167: 
  168:     unload(M),
  169: 
  170:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(function, M),
  171:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(line, M),
  172:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  173: 
  174:     ok.
  175: 
  176: do_get_function_coverage(M, Beam, RunFun, Result) ->
  177:     {FunctionResult,_LineCoverage} = Result,
  178:     FunctionResultBool = [{F,N =/= 0} || {F,N} <- FunctionResult],
  179:     FunctionResultBoolReset = [{F,false} || {F,_} <- FunctionResult],
  180:     FunctionResultBoolZero = [{F,0} || {F,_} <- FunctionResult],
  181: 
  182:     %% Test function mode.
  183: 
  184:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(function),
  185:     {module,M} = code:load_binary(M, "", Beam),
  186:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(none),
  187:     RunFun(),
  188: 
  189:     function = code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  190: 
  191:     FunctionResultBool = code:get_coverage(function, M),
  192:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(line, M),
  193: 
  194:     code:reset_coverage(M),
  195:     FunctionResultBoolReset = code:get_coverage(function, M),
  196: 
  197:     unload(M),
  198: 
  199:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  200:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(function, M),
  201:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(line, M),
  202: 
  203:     %% Test function_counters mode.
  204: 
  205:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(function_counters),
  206:     {module,M} = code:load_binary(M, "", Beam),
  207:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(none),
  208:     RunFun(),
  209: 
  210:     function_counters = code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  211: 
  212:     FunctionResult = code:get_coverage(function, M),
  213:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(line, M),
  214: 
  215:     code:reset_coverage(M),
  216:     FunctionResultBoolZero = code:get_coverage(function, M),
  217: 
  218:     unload(M),
  219: 
  220:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  221:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(function, M),
  222:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(line, M),
  223: 
  224:     ok.
  225: 
  226: do_ensure_no_line_coverage(M, Beam) ->
  227:     %% Test line mode.
  228:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(line),
  229:     {module,M} = code:load_binary(M, "", Beam),
  230:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(none),
  231:     none = code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  232:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(function, M),
  233:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(line, M),
  234: 
  235:     unload(M),
  236: 
  237:     %% Test line counters mode.
  238:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(line_counters),
  239:     {module,M} = code:load_binary(M, "", Beam),
  240:     _ = code:set_coverage_mode(none),
  241:     none = code:get_coverage_mode(M),
  242:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(function, M),
  243:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch code:get_coverage(line, M),
  244: 
  245:     unload(M),
  246: 
  247:     ok.
  248: 
  249: unload(M) ->
  250:     true = code:delete(M),
  251:     _ = code:purge(M),
  252:     ok.
  253: 
  254: error_info(_Config) ->
  255:     %% An atom referring that does not refer to a loaded module.
  256:     NotLoaded = not__a__loaded__module__I__hope,
  257: 
  258:     L = [{get_coverage_mode, [42]},
  259:          {get_coverage_mode, [NotLoaded]},
  260: 
  261:          {get_coverage, [line,42]},
  262:          {get_coverage, [line,NotLoaded]},
  263:          {get_coverage, [line,?MODULE]},
  264:          {get_coverage, [whatever,?MODULE]},
  265: 
  266:          {reset_coverage, [42]},
  267:          {reset_coverage, [NotLoaded]},
  268:          {reset_coverage, [?MODULE]},
  269: 
  270:          {set_coverage_mode, [42]},
  271:          {set_coverage_mode, [xyz]}],
  272: 
  273:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(code, L, [snifs_only]).
